flavorText: "When navigating dangerous terrain, one hundred legs are better than two."

foreignData.flavorText: „Wenn man auf gefährlichem Terrain unterwegs ist, sind einhundert Beine besser als zwei."
foreignData.name: Nimana-Krabbelschleicher
foreignData.text: Solange sich acht oder mehr Karten im Friedhof eines Gegners befinden, erhält der Nimana-Krabbelschleicher +1/+0 und hat Bedrohlichkeit. (Er kann nicht geblockt werden, außer von zwei oder mehr Kreaturen.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Al adentrarse en un terreno peligroso, cien pies valen más que dos".
foreignData.name: Experto furtivo de Nimana
foreignData.text: Mientras un oponente tenga ocho o más cartas en su cementerio, el Experto furtivo de Nimana obtiene +1/+0 y tiene la habilidad de amenaza. (No puede ser bloqueado excepto por dos o más criaturas.)

foreignData.flavorText: « Pour se frayer un chemin en terrain dangereux, cent pattes valent mieux que deux. »
foreignData.name: Lestefile de Nimana
foreignData.text: Tant qu'un adversaire a au moins huit cartes dans son cimetière, le Lestefile de Nimana gagne +1/+0 et a la menace. (Il ne peut pas être bloqué excepté par deux créatures ou plus.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Quando affronti terreni pericolosi, cento gambe sono meglio di due."
foreignData.name: Cavalcabrulicanti di Nimana
foreignData.text: Fintanto che un avversario ha otto o più carte nel suo cimitero, il Cavalcabrulicanti di Nimana prende +1/+0 e ha minacciare. (Non può essere bloccato tranne che da due o più creature.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「危なっかしい地形を移動するには、二本足よりも百本足の方がいいに決まってる。」
foreignData.name: ニマーナの忍び歩く者
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人の墓地にカードが８枚以上あるかぎり、ニマーナの忍び歩く者は＋１/＋０の修整を受け威迫を持つ。（これは２体以上のクリーチャーによってしかブロックされない。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ならず者

foreignData.flavorText: "위험한 지역을 돌아다닐 때에는, 다리 두 개보단 백 개가 낫지."
foreignData.name: 니마나 은밀도적
foreignData.text: 한 상대의 무덤에 카드가 여덟 장 이상 있는 한, 니마나 은밀도적은 +1/+0을 받고 호전적을 가진다. (이 생물은 두 개 이상의 생물에만 방어될 수 있다.)

foreignData.flavorText: "Em terreno perigoso, cem pernas é melhor do que uma."
foreignData.name: Gatuno da Lacraia de Nimana
foreignData.text: Enquanto um oponente tiver oito ou mais cards no próprio cemitério, Gatuno da Lacraia de Nimana receberá +1/+0 e terá ameaçar. (Ele só pode ser bloqueado por duas ou mais criaturas.)

foreignData.flavorText: «Когда пробираешься через опасную местность, сотня ног лучше, чем пара».
foreignData.name: Прыткий Проныра из Ниманы
foreignData.text: Пока у оппонента на кладбище есть восемь или более карт, Прыткий Проныра из Ниманы получает +1/+0 и имеет Угрозу. (Он не может быть заблокирован менее чем двумя существами.)

foreignData.flavorText: 「在危险地带穿行时，一百条腿可比两条腿强。」
foreignData.name: 尼麻纳掠袭客
foreignData.text: 只要任一对手的坟墓场中有八张或更多牌，尼麻纳掠袭客便得+1/+0且具有威慑异能。（它只能被两个或更多生物阻挡。）

foreignData.flavorText: 「在危險地帶穿行時，一百條腿可比兩條腿強。」
foreignData.name: 尼麻納掠襲客
foreignData.text: 只要任一對手的墳墓場中有八張或更多牌，尼麻納掠襲客便得+1/+0且具有威懾異能。（它只能被兩個或更多生物阻擋。）

name: Nimana Skitter-Sneak
originalText: As long as an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, Nimana Skitter-Sneak gets +1/+0 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

rulings.text: Once a single creature has blocked Nimana Skitter-Sneak, causing it to gain menace won’t cause it to become unblocked or remove that blocking creature from combat.

An ability that offers a bonus if an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard won’t provide additional benefits if more than one opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard. There are also no additional benefits no matter how many cards are in an opponent’s graveyard, as long as there are at least eight.
In a multiplayer game, once an opponent leaves the game, they won’t be considered for such an effect, no matter how many cards they had in their graveyard before leaving the game.

text: As long as an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard, Nimana Skitter-Sneak gets +1/+0 and has menace. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
